alert.note: Alert for Harvey; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:44AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Sedgwick and southwestern Harvey Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 744 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Burrton to near Sedgwick to Mcconnell Air Force Base. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Newton, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Maize, Halstead, Sedgwick, Burrton, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, Bentley, East Wichita, Northeast Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base, South Wichita, Oaklawn and Jabara Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 29. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 42 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
